Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath

Class FhirPathQuantity

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.FhirPathQuantity
public class FhirPathQuantity extends Object
Represents a FHIRPath Quantity value.

  • Method Details

    • getSystem

      @Nonnull public String getSystem()
      Gets the system URI for this quantity's unit.
      Returns:
      the system URI (e.g., "http://unitsofmeasure.org" or "https://hl7.org/fhirpath/N1/calendar-duration")

    • getCode

      @Nonnull public String getCode()
      Gets the canonical code for this quantity's unit.
      Returns:
      the unit code (e.g., "mg", "second")

    • ofUcum

      @Nonnull public static FhirPathQuantity ofUcum(@Nonnull BigDecimal value, @Nonnull String unit)
      Factory method for UCUM quantities.
      Parameters:
      value - the numeric value
      unit - the UCUM unit string (e.g. 'mg', 'kg', 'mL')
      Returns:
      UCUM quantity

    • ofDuration

      @Nonnull public static FhirPathQuantity ofDuration(@Nonnull BigDecimal value, @Nonnull String calendarDurationUnit)
      Factory method for calendar duration quantities.
      Parameters:
      value - the numeric value
      calendarDurationUnit - the FHIRPath calendar duration unit string (e.g., "year", "month", "days") singular or plural
      Returns:
      calendar duration quantity

    • parse

      @Nonnull public static FhirPathQuantity parse(@Nonnull String literal)
      Parses a FHIRPath quantity literal (e.g. 5.4 'mg', 1 year, 42). Only supports UCUM and calendar duration units. When no unit is specified, defaults to '1' in UCUM system.
      Parameters:
      literal - the FHIRPath quantity literal
      Returns:
      the parsed FhirPathQuantity
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the literal is not a valid FHIRPath quantity literal

    • ofUnit

      @Nonnull public static FhirPathQuantity ofUnit(@Nonnull BigDecimal value, @Nonnull FhirPathUnit unit, @Nonnull String unitName)
      Factory method for creating a quantity from a FhirPathUnit.
      Parameters:
      value - the numeric value
      unit - the FhirPathUnit (UCUM, calendar duration, or custom)
      unitName - the name of the unit
      Returns:
      quantity with the specified value and unit

    • ofUnit

      @Nonnull public static FhirPathQuantity ofUnit(@Nonnull BigDecimal value, @Nonnull FhirPathUnit unit)
      Factory method for creating a quantity from a FhirPathUnit.
      Parameters:
      value - the numeric value
      unit - the FhirPathUnit (UCUM, calendar duration, or custom)
      Returns:
      quantity with the specified value and unit

    • of

      @Nullable public static FhirPathQuantity of(@Nullable BigDecimal value, @Nullable String system, @Nullable String code, @Nullable String unit)
      Factory method for creating a quantity from system, code, and optional unit name. This method is typically used when reconstructing quantities from FHIR Quantity resources.
      Parameters:
      value - the numeric value (nullable)
      system - the system URI (nullable)
      code - the unit code (nullable)
      unit - the optional unit name (nullable, defaults to code if not provided)
      Returns:
      quantity with the specified value and unit, or null if any required parameter is null

    • convertToUnit

      @Nonnull public Optional<FhirPathQuantity> convertToUnit(@Nonnull String unitName, int scale)
      Converts this quantity to the specified target unit if a conversion is possible.

      Supports:

      • UCUM to UCUM conversions (e.g., 'mg' to 'kg')
      • Calendar duration to calendar duration conversions (only to definite units: second, millisecond)
      • Cross-type conversions: calendar duration to UCUM 's' or 'ms', and vice versa
      Parameters:
      unitName - the target unit string (e.g., "mg", "second", "s")
      scale - the scale to apply to the converted value
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the converted quantity, or empty if conversion is not possible

    • convertToUnit

      @Nonnull public Optional<FhirPathQuantity> convertToUnit(@Nonnull String unitName)
      Converts this quantity to the specified target unit if a conversion is possible, using the default scale.
      Parameters:
      unitName - the target unit string (e.g., "mg", "second", "s")
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the converted quantity, or empty if conversion is not possible

    • asCanonical

      public Optional<FhirPathQuantity> asCanonical()
      Converts this quantity to its canonical UCUM representation if possible.

      Uses the UCUM conversion service to determine the canonical form of the quantity. UCUM quantities are converted to their canonical UCUM units, while definite calendar durations are converted to their UCUM equivalents (e.g., 's' for seconds).

      Returns:
      an Optional containing the canonical UCUM quantity, or empty if conversion is not possible

      @Nonnull public String toString()
